body_html:
I think all boils down to how "patience" is understood by different people. Consider those two definitions:

  • How many bad epochs can you see before you start considering changing the learning rate.
  • How many bad epochs can you see before you change the learning rate.

The first point gives you the current code, the second one gives the one after your patch. I have no strong preference towards any of them, although I agree that the second one might seem simpler.

Regarding the tests, we do have some for this feature, so you'll need to patch those up.
